name: Humboldt Headband
description: Humboldt Headband is Humboldt Seed’s version of the crowd-pleaser, Headband. Unlike the traditional sativa-dominant Headband, Humboldt breeds in Purple Panty Dropper for its weighty indica genetics, resulting in a euphoric 75% indica-dominant strain that relieves aches and pains. Expect a heady pressure that may resemble the sensation of wearing a headband. As its effects melt into the body, anticipate pleasurable physical relaxation with latent aphrodisiac effects.
descriptionPlain: Humboldt Headband is Humboldt Seed’s version of the crowd-pleaser, Headband. Unlike the traditional sativa-dominant Headband, Humboldt breeds in Purple Panty Dropper for its weighty indica genetics, resulting in a euphoric 75% indica-dominant strain that relieves aches and pains. Expect a heady pressure that may resemble the sensation of wearing a headband. As its effects melt into the body, anticipate pleasurable physical relaxation with latent aphrodisiac effects.

highlightedReviews.text: This will be one of my favorites love this one when I'm alone after a long day at the gym and other activities. After one bong hit all my pain and stresses are taken away and leaves you floatingüôåüèª. After I got my munchies , and I layer in my bed and turned on the tv to play video games and I was playing Mario Kart 8 and and it's pretty fun and it trips you out sometimes the courses. But to cut it short great strain.
Berry or lime tasting,  very laid back, get nothing done ...kind of high...good for aches and pains.
